curam.util.ctm.bom.impl

Class CodeTableSecurityBOMImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • curam.util.ctm.bom.BusinessObjectModuleImpl
      • curam.util.ctm.bom.impl.CodeTableSecurityBOMImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BusinessObjectModule, SecurityBOM

    public class CodeTableSecurityBOMImpl
extends BusinessObjectModuleImpl
implements SecurityBOM
    This class determines the SIDs needed for reading and writing to a Code Table BOM.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CodeTableSecurityBOMImpl()
      Default no-arg constructor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getReadSecurityIdentifier()
      This method returns the list of security SIDs that a user must have access to in order to have read access for the Code Table BOM.
      java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getWriteSecurityIdentifier()
      This method returns the list of security SIDS that a user must have access to in order to have write access for the Code Table BOM.

      • Methods inherited from class curam.util.ctm.bom.BusinessObjectModuleImpl

        equals, getName, getOffset, getType, hashCode, toString

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, finalize, getClass, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

        getName, getOffset, getType

    • Constructor Detail

      • CodeTableSecurityBOMImpl

        public CodeTableSecurityBOMImpl()
        Default no-arg constructor. This calls the super constructor setting the type to be Code table and the offset to 0.

    • Method Detail

      • getReadSecurityIdentifier

        public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getReadSecurityIdentifier()
                                                          throws AppException,
                                                                 InformationalException
        This method returns the list of security SIDs that a user must have access to in order to have read access for the Code Table BOM. This includes a combination of SIDs required for the different entities that make up a Code Table BOM.
        Specified by:
        getReadSecurityIdentifier in interface SecurityBOM
        Returns:
        A set of security identifiers that the user must have access to in order to read Code Table BOM information.
        Throws:
        InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.
        AppException - Generic Exception Signature.

      • getWriteSecurityIdentifier

        public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getWriteSecurityIdentifier()
                                                           throws AppException,
                                                                  InformationalException
        This method returns the list of security SIDS that a user must have access to in order to have write access for the Code Table BOM. This includes a combination of SIDs required for the different entities that make up a Code Table BOM.
        Specified by:
        getWriteSecurityIdentifier in interface SecurityBOM
        Returns:
        A set of security identifiers that the user must have access to in order to create/update Code Table BOMs.
        Throws:
        InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.
        AppException - Generic Exception Signature.
